mapper.insert: INSERT INTO statistic (login_count, register_count, total_register_count, note_count, submit_note_count, total_note_count, date) VALUES (#{loginCount}, #{registerCount}, #{totalRegisterCount}, #{noteCount}, #{submitNoteCount}, #{totalNoteCount}, #{date})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM statistic ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
